data.message: Good morning Facebook! Hi You did a great job today by connecting people from one continent to another a thousand miles away. Helps the burden loads of fragments of problems of a certain individual by relating and narratiting them to her family and friends on the oter corner of the globe. ttttttTherefore life becomes lighter and some easier again maybe not that perfect but it  revolves again normally!  Thanks Facebook! You act like an anti stress factor!!! Ha! ha! ha! Happy Facebook!

replies.message: Thanks for the kind words, Myrna! We're happy you're able to stay connected with friends and family across the globe. -Jessica

Thanks Jessica! Hi Facebook I can't seem to tag you in my own comment so I came here. I tried to contact you via Messenger but my message isn't delivering so I had to "send feedback." I did check the help center and did not find that any of the pre written answers were helpful. Please message me back or give me a way to contact facebook directly like most reliable companies do.
